name: Troop Ghosts
description:
submission for the Gamedev.tv 2022 game jam - https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

WELCOME TO TROOP GHOSTS!

You play as a Loyal Troop who possesses the ability to came back from the dead. Use your ability to defend the princess from lizard creatures. Will  you be able to escort her through the woods back to her castle?

WASD to move

SourceCode https://www.dropbox.com/sh/31ra071lfusc1t4/AAD3P2LnZe8z7HF_QxAF02Tma?dl=0
